dt-api.summary: Get the `dt-tag tfoot` nodes for the tables in the API's context
dt-api.description:
DataTables and its plug-ins can create additional tables in the document. For example when scrolling is enable, the table is split into three individual tables, the header, footer and body in order to provide cross-browser scrolling, while FixedHeader / FixedColumns create cloned tables for static positioning.

		This method, and its singular counterpart, are provided to give easy access to the original `dt-tag tfoot` elements for DOM manipulation.
dt-api.name: tables().footer()

example.title: Add a class to the original `dt-tag tfoot` element

returns.content: DataTables API instance with the table footer nodes from the selected tables in the result set.
